i1.name: Glorious Evolution
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Viktor''' starts each game with an exclusive {{ii|Prototype Hex Core}}, which permanently occupies one of his item slots. For some additional {{g|gold}}, '''Viktor''' can upgrade his ''Hex Core'' to increase its bonuses and grant him one ''Evolution'' point, which he can use to augment one of his basic [[Champion ability|abilities]]. Once he augments all of his basic abilities, '''Viktor''' automatically augments his ultimate ability, {{ai|Chaos Storm|Viktor}}.
* {{ii|Prototype Hex Core}}: {{Item data Prototype Hex Core|pst2|pass}}
* {{ii|Hex Core mk-1}}: {{Item data Hex Core mk-1|pst2|pass}} Gives one ''Evolution'' point.
* {{ii|Hex Core mk-2}}: {{Item data Hex Core mk-2|pst2|pass}} Gives one ''Evolution'' point.
* {{ii|Perfect Hex Core}}: {{Item data Perfect Hex Core|pst2|pass}} Gives one ''Evolution'' point.

q1.name: Siphon Power
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' {{tip|shields}} himself for {{passive progression/deprecated version|30 to 115}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds and hurls a projectile at the target enemy, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and empowering '''Viktor''' with {{ai|Discharge|Viktor}} for {{fd|3.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|Discharge:}} '''Viktor's''' next [[basic attack]] becomes a {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}} and is modified to deal {{as|magic damage}} against non-{{tip|structures}}.

{{sbc|{{ai|Augment- Turbocharge|Viktor|Augment: Turbocharge}}:}} '''Viktor''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds after using ''Siphon Power'', while also increasing the shield's value by 60%, up to {{passive progression/deprecated version|30*1.6 to 115*1.6}} {{as|(+ 32% AP)}}.
q1.notes:
* All damage dealt by {{nie|Spellblade}} on the enhanced attack is converted into {{as|magic damage}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent '''Viktor''' from gaining ''Discharge''.
* {{tip|Critical strike}} and {{sti|life steal|link=true}} only interact with the basic attack damage component.
* If the target dies, becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, or '''Viktor''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time, ''Siphon Power'' cancels but does not go on {{sti|cooldown}} nor consumes any {{tip|mana}}.
* Only the initial projectile can be blocked.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Discharge's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).

w1.name: Gravity Field
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' deploys a gravitational imprisonment device at the target location for 4 seconds. The trap arms after {{fd|0.75}} seconds and {{tip|slow|slows}} all enemies within the field, persisting for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after leaving the area or generating 3 stacks.

Whilst under the trap's effects, enemies generate a [[stack]] every {{fd|0.5}} seconds. At 3 stacks, they are {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} and {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds but they become immune to the {{tip|slow}} from ''Gravity Field'' and cannot generate stacks again. This may only occur once per cast.
{{sbc|{{ai|Augment- Magnetize|Viktor|Augment: Magnetize}}:}} '''Viktor's''' damaging abilities, excluding {{ais|Chaos Storm|Viktor}} per second damage, {{tip|slow}} enemies hit by 20% for 1 second.
w1.notes:
* ''Gravity Field'' will remain active if '''Viktor''' dies.
* ''Gravity Field's'' animation can be seen by both teams through [[Sight|fog of war]].

e1.name: Death Ray
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' uses his synthetic arm to fire an energy beam 500 units down the target path, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to every enemy it hits. The arm can fire in any direction from any point within [[range]].
{{sbc|{{ai|Augment- Aftershock|Viktor|Augment: Aftershock}}:}} An explosion follows in ''Death Ray's'' wake after 1 second, dealing additional {{as|magic damage}}.
leveling: {{st|{{ai|Augment- Aftershock|Viktor|Aftershock}} Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 180}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|70+20 to 230+180}} {{as|(+ 130% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* '''Viktor''' may freely act while the ray is traveling.
** The effected area is set upon casting, no matter how far away '''Viktor''' moves. Unlike a leash, ''Death Ray'' will not break off its own effect.
* The laser grants a moderate area of {{tip|sight}} around where the beam strikes the ground.
* If ''Death Ray'' is {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}, the initial ray is not destroyed.
** However, the capability to be blocked only applies to the laser as it hits the ground. '''Viktor''' can cast the ability ''over'' the wall and it will not be destroyed or intercepted. 
** ''Augmented Death Ray'' will still cause the entire target area to explode even if the laser is blocked.
* If '''Viktor''' dies while he is firing the beam it only deals damage up to the location at the time of his death.
